48040.name: Academic Espionage
48040.text: Shuffle 10 cards from your opponent's class into your deck. They cost (1).
48040.flavorText: The tenth Pyroblast really felt like overkill.

48993.name: Annoy-o-Module
48993.flavorText: Every ten seconds it asks if you want to update.

49171.name: Arcane Dynamo
49171.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (5) or more.
49171.flavorText: We ran out of jars, so we started putting brains in other stuff.

47978.name: Astral Rift
47978.text: Add 2 random minions to your hand.
47978.flavorText: Let's see what's behind rift number one!

48195.name: Astromancer
48195.text: Battlecry: Summon a random minion with Cost equal to your hand size.

49269.name: Augmented Elekk
49269.text: Whenever you shuffle a card into a deck, shuffle in an extra copy.

48984.name: Autodefense Matrix
48984.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, give it Divine Shield.
48984.flavorText: We call it the bubble machine.

48798.name: Beakered Lightning
48798.flavorText: Working in a shaman's lab, it's important to be well-grounded.

48142.name: Beryllium Nullifier
48142.flavorText: Why Beryllium? Because it's hard to spell.

47887.name: Biology Project
47887.flavorText: Step 1: Grow giant evil strawberry. Step 2: ???? Step 3: Rule Azeroth!

49361.name: Blightnozzle Crawler
49361.flavorText: "Well we HAD it contained. Then you went and gave it legs!"

47840.name: Bomb Toss
47840.text: Deal 2 damage. Summon a 0/2 Goblin Bomb.

47841.name: Boommaster Flark
47841.flavorText: Every good plan requires a bit of patience. And a lot of explosives.

48544.name: Brainstormer
48544.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each spell in your hand.
48544.flavorText: Her hair was always like that.

47781.name: Bronze Gatekeeper
47781.flavorText: "You have my shield! And the rest of me too."

49163.name: Bull Dozer
49163.flavorText: Leave them alone for two minutes and they go right into sleep mode.

49263.name: Celestial Emissary
49263.text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn has Spell Damage +2.

48566.name: Cloakscale Chemist
48566.flavorText: Her suit was fitted using a scale model.

48759.name: Cloning Device
48759.text: Discover a copy of a minion in your opponent's deck.
48759.flavorText: Zerek got sick of fighting over the remote.

49233.name: Coppertail Imposter
49233.flavorText: It was fitting in fine until it gathered nuts and bolts.

49045.name: Cosmic Anomaly
49045.flavorText: INGREDIENTS: STAR-STUFF, BLUE 1, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS.

49494.name: Crazed Chemist
49494.flavorText: You don't have to be crazy to work here, but it helps.

49018.name: Crystallizer
49018.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero. Gain 5 Armor.
49018.flavorText: This elf's winning the arms race.

48637.name: Crystalsmith Kangor
48637.flavorText: He wants to tank, but Boom always makes him play support.

48985.name: Crystology
48985.text: Draw two 1-Attack minions from your deck.
48985.flavorText: "The Light is neither a particle nor a wave. It's more of a juice, really."

48772.name: Cybertech Chip
48772.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Mech to your hand."

49019.name: Damaged Stegotron
49019.flavorText: Sadly the warranty does not cover fireballs or acts of Boom.

48929.name: Dead Ringer
48929.text: Deathrattle: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck.

50432.name: Demonic Project
50432.text: Each player transforms a random minion in their hand into a Demon.
50432.flavorText: Another group project where Jaraxxus doesn't do any work.

49621.name: Dendrologist
49621.text: Battlecry: If you control a Treant, Discover a spell.
49621.flavorText: He's teaching his little buddy to talk, but all it says is, "I am Gloop."

48116.name: Doubling Imp
48116.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
48116.flavorText: What's worse than finding two imps in your lab? Only finding one of them.

48146.name: Dr. Boom, Mad Genius
48146.text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Mechs have Rush.
48146.flavorText: "Of course I've gone mad with power. Ever try going mad without it?"

48717.name: Dr. Morrigan
48717.text: Deathrattle: Swap this with a minion from your deck.
48717.flavorText: She will NOT STOP until she gets tenure.

48612.name: Dreampetal Florist
48612.text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (7).
48612.flavorText: Unlike gnomes, dreampetals grow more than 3 feet tall.

48542.name: Dyn-o-matic
48542.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all minions except Mechs.
48542.flavorText: Star player on the inter-office Boomball team.

49172.name: E.M.P. Operative
49172.flavorText: "I said this looks like a job for me So everybody just follow me 'Cause we need a little E.M.P. 'Cause it feels so mechy without me…"

48823.name: Ectomancy
48823.text: Summon copies of all Demons you control.

48537.name: Electra Stormsurge
48537.text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn casts twice.
48537.flavorText: "The coin? You used me for THE COIN!?"

49188.name: Electrowright
49188.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, gain +1/+1.

48051.name: Elementary Reaction
48051.text: Draw a card. Copy it if you played an Elemental last turn.

48691.name: Eternium Rover
48691.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain 2 Armor.
48691.flavorText: He's all beeps and smiles but you're just a walking pile of armor to him.

48799.name: Eureka!
48799.text: Summon a copy of a random minion from your hand.
48799.flavorText: Genius is 1% inspiration, and 99% drawing your Deathwing.

49161.name: Explodinator
49161.flavorText: When it absolutely, positively, has to blow up overnight.

48101.name: Extra Arms
48101.text: Give a minion +2/+2. Add 'More Arms!' to your hand that gives +2/+2.
48101.flavorText: All the better to hug you with!

47855.name: Fireworks Tech
47855.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +1/+1. If it has Deathrattle, trigger it.
47855.flavorText: She learns by trial and error. Mostly error.

48670.name: Flark's Boom-Zooka
48670.text: Summon 3 minions from your deck. They attack enemy minions, then die.
48670.flavorText: It used to be a Ba-zooka but we ran out of sheep.

48757.name: Flobbidinous Floop
48757.text: While in your hand, this is a 3/4 copy of the last minion you played.
48757.flavorText: Of all the scientists, he has the most knowledge (when measured in volume).

48837.name: Floop's Glorious Gloop
48837.text: Whenever a minion dies this turn, refresh a Mana Crystal.
48837.flavorText: How much gloop could Floop's Gloop gloop if Floop's Gloop could gloop gloop?

48983.name: Galvanizer
48983.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Mechs in your hand by (1).
48983.flavorText: Also known as a power zinc.

48226.name: Giggling Inventor
48226.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and Divine Shield.
48226.flavorText: "I shall build a mighty golden paladin! And he will GREET the WORLD!"

48744.name: Gloop Sprayer
48744.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of each adjacent minion.
48744.flavorText: "Are you sure that's enough gloop?" "Hold on."

48982.name: Glow-Tron
48982.flavorText: They tried for weeks to make a stealth version, but eventually decided to just let it glow.

48989.name: Glowstone Technician
48989.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
48989.flavorText: "Windell! More light!" "I'm givin' it all she's got, Kangor!"

47837.name: Goblin Bomb
47837.text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
47837.flavorText: They're Dr. Boom's babies. His baby boomers.

48770.name: Goblin Prank
48770.text: Give a friendly minion +3/+3 and Rush. It dies at end of turn.

49201.name: Harbinger Celestia
49201.text: Stealth After your opponent plays a minion, become a copy of it.
49201.flavorText: She wanders realities, taking on many forms. One was a unicorn princess.

48415.name: Holomancer
48415.text: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 1/1 copy of it.
48415.flavorText: Help me, worthy opponent. You're my only hope.

48524.name: Juicy Psychmelon
48524.text: Draw a 7, 8, 9, and 10-Cost minion from your deck.
48524.flavorText: It's not juicy at all. IT'S JUST MESSING WITH YOUR HEAD.

49279.name: Kaboom Bot
49279.text: Deathrattle: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.

49009.name: Kangor's Endless Army
49009.text: Resurrect 3 friendly Mechs. They keep any Magnetic upgrades.
49009.flavorText: "That's three, Kangor. Three isn't endless." - Countess Ashmore

48480.name: Lab Recruiter
48480.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 copies of a friendly minion into your deck.
48480.flavorText: Join the chemistry lab! We've got all the solutions.

48607.name: Landscaping
48607.flavorText: We'll put a happy tree right here... and give him a little friend.

49176.name: Loose Specimen
49176.text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split among other friendly minions.
49176.flavorText: You leave Deathstalker Rexxar alone in the lab for TWO minutes…

48198.name: Luna's Pocket Galaxy
48198.text: Change the Cost of minions in your deck to (1).
48198.flavorText: Luna became head of the astronomy department when her boss invented the Pocket Black Hole.

48625.name: Mecha'thun
48625.text: Deathrattle: If you have no cards in your deck, hand, and battlefield, destroy the enemy hero.
48625.flavorText: "Your software will fail. Your users will abandon you. You are already obsolete."

47924.name: Mechanical Whelp
47924.flavorText: "Well if I didn't build the whelp and YOU didn't build the whelp…"

49169.name: Mechano-Egg
49169.flavorText: When you need more iron in your diet.

48886.name: Mecharoo
48886.flavorText: Its project name was KAN-GA. The little one was R-00.

49162.name: Menacing Nimbus
49162.text: Battlecry: Add a random Elemental to your hand.
49162.flavorText: Electra stores her elementals in the cloud.

48693.name: Meteorologist
48693.text: Battlecry: For each card in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
48693.flavorText: Some say the world will end in fire. Some say in ice. Why not BOTH?

49164.name: Microtech Controller
49164.flavorText: Best-selling author of "How to Make Friends You Completely Control."

48552.name: Missile Launcher
48552.text: Magnetic At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other characters.
48552.flavorText: We asked, "Where do the missiles go?" and he answered, "Yes."

48831.name: Mulchmuncher
48831.text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each friendly Treant that died this game.

48159.name: Myra Rotspring
48159.flavorText: On her first day on the job, Myra removed the smoke detectors.

48487.name: Myra's Unstable Element
48487.text: Draw the rest of your deck.

48478.name: Necrium Blade
48478.text: Deathrattle: Trigger the Deathrattle of a random friendly minion.

48748.name: Necrium Vial
48748.flavorText: Two near-death experiences for the price of one!

47856.name: Necromechanic
47856.flavorText: If at first you don't succeed, die, die again.

48298.name: Nethersoul Buster
48298.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each damage your hero has taken this turn.
48298.flavorText: Why did the demon cross the streams? To get to The Other Side.

49167.name: Omega Agent
49167.text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, summon 2 copies of this minion.
49167.flavorText: They don't just find the truth. They give it a ten second head start, then hunt it down.

48515.name: Omega Assembly
48515.text: Discover a Mech. If you have 10 Mana Crystals, keep all 3 instead.
48515.flavorText: They told Dr. Boom he could only pick one. He disagreed.

48508.name: Omega Defender
48508.text: Taunt Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, gain +10 Attack.

48099.name: Omega Medic
48099.text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, restore 10 Health to your hero.
48099.flavorText: She feels waiting for healing makes you appreciate it more.

49175.name: Omega Mind
49175.text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, your spells have Lifesteal this turn.
49175.flavorText: Has a side-business selling her lipstick shade, "Omega Red."

48223.name: Piloted Reaper
48223.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random minion from your hand that costs (2) or less.
48223.flavorText: New facial recognition systems keep out the Lorewalkers and Doomsayers.

48471.name: Pogo-Hopper
48471.text: Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for each other Pogo-Hopper you played this game.
48471.flavorText: Once you hop, you just can't stop!

49013.name: Power Word: Replicate
49013.text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 5/5 copy of it.
49013.flavorText: Available as a bundle, along with Power Words: Detonate, Animate, Annihilate, and Paper Weight.

48764.name: Prismatic Lens
48764.text: Draw a minion and a spell from your deck. Swap their Costs.
48764.flavorText: Mined exclusively from the dark side of the moon.

49416.name: Reckless Experimenter
49416.text: Deathrattle minions you play cost (3) less, but die at the end of the turn.
49416.flavorText: It's hard to call her reckless when it's clear she knows what she's doing.

48536.name: Replicating Menace
48536.flavorText: It's a car! *Whomp whomp whomp* It's a robot! *Whomp whom-CRUNCH* It's… three.. smaller robots!

48692.name: Research Project
48692.flavorText: Abstract: Analyzing systemic applications of coldlight data sets vis-a-vis shuffle-related paradigms. Conclusion: Yay, cards!

47925.name: Rocket Boots
47925.text: Give a minion Rush. Draw a card.
47925.flavorText: This is the happiest moment of Grik's life. We'll miss him.

47888.name: Rusty Recycler
47888.flavorText: Ironic. It could recycle others, but not itself.

56223.name: SN1P-SN4P
56223.flavorText: "It's gonna be snip this, snap that. Bada-snip, bada-snap!"

48753.name: Seaforium Bomber
48753.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 5 damage.
48753.flavorText: Dress for the bomb you want, not the bomb you have.

48519.name: Secret Plan
48519.flavorText: The secret is... There is no plan!

48100.name: Security Rover
48100.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/3 Mech with Taunt.

49081.name: Shooting Star
49081.text: Deal 1 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.

48644.name: Shrink Ray
48644.text: Set the Attack and Health of all minions to 1.
48644.flavorText: Actually works by enlarging the rest of the world.

48211.name: Soul Infusion
48211.text: Give the left-most minion in your hand +2/+2.
48211.flavorText: People called him a soulless monster. We're not sure this is better.

47979.name: Spark Drill
47979.text: Rush Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Sparks with Rush to your hand.
47979.flavorText: Preferred weapon of Dr. Boom's orthodontist.

49170.name: Spark Engine
49170.text: Battlecry: Add a 1/1 Spark with Rush to your hand.

48185.name: Spider Bomb
48185.flavorText: Wrecks a dude, any size. Catches thieves, eats those guys. Look out! Here comes a Spider Bomb!

48113.name: Spirit Bomb
48113.text: Deal 4 damage to a minion and your hero.
48113.flavorText: Might take a few episodes to power up.

49195.name: Star Aligner
49195.text: Battlecry: If you control 3 minions with 7 Health, deal 7 damage to all enemies.
49195.flavorText: "You're a Sagittarius? Me too! Just gimme a sec."

47982.name: Stargazer Luna
47982.text: After you play the right-most card in your hand, draw a card.

48490.name: Storm Chaser
48490.text: Battlecry: Draw a spell from your deck that costs (5) or more.
48490.flavorText: Best drank after a stiff gale.

48526.name: Supercollider
48526.text: After you attack a minion, force it to attack one of its neighbors.
48526.flavorText: Boom's Second Law of Motion: HIT IT VERY HARD!

48609.name: Tending Tauren
48609.text: Choose One - Give your other minions +1/+1; or Summon two 2/2 Treants.
48609.flavorText: That racial bonus to Herbalism finally paid off.

49265.name: Test Subject
49265.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle any spells you cast on this minion into your deck.

47928.name: The Boomship
47928.text: Summon 3 random minions from your hand. Give them Rush.
47928.flavorText: Dr. Boom ends his motivational speeches by dropping the mechs.

48161.name: The Storm Bringer
48161.text: Transform your minions into random Legendary minions.
48161.flavorText: Finally, Electra can work from home.

48527.name: Thunderhead
48527.text: After you play a card with Overload, summon two 1/1 Sparks with Rush.
48527.flavorText: Most of his friends are still Metalheads.

48976.name: Topsy Turvy
48976.text: Swap a minion's Attack and Health.
48976.flavorText: "Help! I've fallen and I can't get down!"

48034.name: Toxicologist
48034.flavorText: Double-majoring in culinary sciences was definitely a mistake.

48803.name: Unexpected Results
48803.text: Summon two random 2-Cost minions (improved by Spell Damage).
48803.flavorText: Sometimes science is more art than science. A lot of people don’t get that.

48060.name: Unpowered Mauler
48060.text: Can only attack if you cast a spell this turn.
48060.flavorText: After a stressful work day it really needs an outlet.

47842.name: Venomizer
47842.flavorText: Keeps getting banned for toxic behavior.

48035.name: Violet Haze
48035.text: Add 2 random Deathrattle cards to your hand.
48035.flavorText: Elite Tauren Chieftain's next hit single.

48835.name: Void Analyst
48835.text: Deathrattle: Give all Demons in your hand +1/+1.

49052.name: Voltaic Burst
49052.flavorText: Batteries have three components: Cathode, Anode, and Overload.

49356.name: Wargear
49356.flavorText: WAR! GEAR! What is it good for?

48518.name: Weaponized Piñata
48518.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
48518.flavorText: It'll be fine. It's not like they have any reason to hate us.

47860.name: Weapons Project
47860.text: Each player equips a 2/3 weapon and gains 6 Armor.
47860.flavorText: Harrison Jones was kicked off this project.

50477.name: Whizbang the Wonderful
50477.text: You start the game with one of Whizbang's Wonderful Decks!

49421.name: Zerek's Cloning Gallery
49421.text: Summon a 1/1 copy of each minion in your deck.
49421.flavorText: Cloning can be a jarring experience.

48203.name: Zerek, Master Cloner
48203.text: Deathrattle: If you've cast any spells on this minion, resummon it.
48203.flavorText: His original name was Aerek. Then the first clone was Berek. They went evil around Merek.

49184.name: Zilliax
49184.flavorText: Everything but the kitchen sink. Oh wait, there's one on his back.
